name: CandyZoo 2 Electric Boogaloo
description: CandyZoo 2 is a frantic, ugly, hard drinking, mentally unstable anthology of the 12+ months work. Some of these may be familiar with you, while others have remained unreleased till now. You can buy it now for Windows PC on Sellbox.Com for $3 dollars and up. Name your price, its always nice!
